name: don't look at the sun [DEMO]
description:
A small GB Studio game done for the A Game By its Cover Jam 2020 based on this cover. Due to life-related things, I was not able to get this game to the state I wanted it to be by the end of the jam, so hence me calling this a demo. I do plan on adding updates to the game post-jam, including:

  • The second shoot-em-up level
  • Boss battle with the sun
  • A life bar system
